transcription.text: The fun-loving Humphrey B Bear first bounded onto Australian TV in 1965 and has been bringing joy to children and adults ever since. Humphrey was the star of the Here's Humphrey show, one of the world's longest-running kids' TV shows with around 3,000 episodes. Humphrey's popularity is evident in all this merchandise and memorabilia, which shows how Humphrey has inspired children across decades to play, learn and create at home.
